title: An absolutely fantastic, well made video I found on the current botlane meta
body:
So historically the boards gets a bad rep for shitposts getting frontpage and salty rants influencing balanced. In an effort to improve this, here's and extremely well made video I found on the current bot meta. 

This guy discusses a lot of the fundamentals of balance and what is currently going on in a way that is easy to understand by most players. Enjoy!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YnDdd_BMq5M
